info.title: API Management / Dev Portal API
info.description: This OpenAPI specification describes the contract for the API Management / Dev Portal API. Please note - at this time the specification is in an elaboration/design phase and there is currently no API Implementation available.

tags.name: registrations
tags.description: Manage consumer credentials and access requests for apps

tags.name: candidates
tags.description: Candidate resources and operations for review - e.e. API Management may want to create and manage API Product Plans

get.description:
"This resource allows filtering of results by query using RSQL.
Example: ?query=brokerType==solace and version.state==RETIRED
The following fields are available: id, name, applicationDomainName, applicationDomainId, shared, 
brokerType, customAttributes.name, customAttributes.value, plan id
version.createdTime, version.updatedTime, version.description, version.version, version.summary, version.displayName, version.state,
version.customAttributes.name, version.customAttributes.value"

400.description: Bad request. Likely an invalid auth token provided.

requestBody.description: Patch for Event API Product Attribute

200.description: the Event API Product's Versioned Attributes

requestBody.description: New Event API Product Versioned Attribute

200.description: the Event API Product Versioned Attribute

requestBody.description: Patch for Event API Product Versioned Attribute

200.description: Updated Event API Product Version Attribute

requestBody.description: Patch to the Event API Product Plan

200.description: list of the Event API Product Plan APIs
Async API Definition of the Plan's API

get.description:
"This resource allows filtering of results by query using RSQL. 
The following fields are available: 
  registrationId, name, customAttributes.name, customAttributes.value
An example query: ?query=registrationId==5 and customAttributes.name==EXPORTABLE and customAttributes.value==TRUE"

400.description: Bad request. Likely an invalid auth token provided.

200.description: list of apis the app has access to
the async api specification tailored to the current app

post.description: Creates a new Access Request. The initial state of the request is returned in the response. If the  Event API Product requires "manual" approval the request is in "pending" state, if it is "auto" the request is in "approved" state.

400.description: Bad request, contains information about failed back end calls when the app is  provisioned

422.description: Duplicate app or invalid object reference e.g. invalid API product name

500.description: Internal Server error, contains information about failed back end calls when the  app is provisioned

400.description: Bad request, contains information about failed back end calls when the app is  provisioned

422.description: Duplicate app or invalid object reference e.g. invalid API product name

500.description: Internal Server error, contains information about failed back end calls when the  app is provisioned

get.description: This resource allows filtering of results by query. The following fields are available: id, solaceCloudMessagingServiceId, messagingServiceType, name, environmentName, eventMeshName

query.name: query
query.description: Query string for filtering entity. Expressed in FIQL/RSQL language. Documentation link to help with multiple values for query - https://github.com/jirutka/rsql-parser.

page_size.name: pageSize
page_size.description: The number of items to get per page. Min: 1 Max: 100

page_number.name: pageNumber
page_number.description: The page number to get. Min: 1

sort_field_name.name: sortFieldName
sort_field_name.description: name of a field to sort on

PreconditionFailed.description: PreConditon Failed, likely a mismatch between current etag and if-match header

messageDeliveryMode.description: The type of message delivery mode in the current event API product version

maximumTimeToLive.description: Duration in seconds of how long a message can live in a queue

queueType.description: The type of queue to be used in the current event API product version

maxMsgSpoolUsage.description: Total number of MBs available for the queue to use

topicFilters.description: List of variable that contains address node name and filters

Filter.description: List of filters that contains eventVersionId name and variables

filterValue.description: Different filter values separated by comma

TopicFilter.description: List of variable that contains address node name and filters

description.example: Event API product created by Solace PubSub+ Cloud documentation

summary.example: Summary string value of event API product version

filters.description: List of filters that contains eventVersionId name and variables

brokerType.description: The type of the broker used for the event API product

description.example: Event Api created by Solace PubSub+ Cloud documentation

Credentials.description: Credentials object associated with an app

WebHookHeaderAuth.description: A HTTP header used for authentication

WebHookTLSOptions.description: TLS options required to support older PS+ brokers.

tlsTrustedCommonNames.description: The Trusted Common Names for the REST Consumer are used by encrypted transports to verify the name in the certificate presented by the remote REST consumer. They must include the common name of the remote REST consumer's server certificate.

WebHookHeader.description: An arbitrary HTTP header applied to the WebHook

environments.description: environments that this webhook serves, if absent webhook will be used for all environments

WebHookIdList.description: Name and display name attribute of a webhook

WebHookIds.description: Name and display name attribute of a webhook

name.description: The name of the credentials object.

additionalProperties.description: A JSON map containing the credentials information.

credentials.description: A JSON map containing the credentials information.

authenticationType.description: The type of the authentication object.

additionalProperties.description: A JSON map containing a map of extra details for the authentication.

authenticationDetails.description: A JSON map containing a map of extra details for the authentication.

url.description: The url of the connection object.

protocol.description: The protocol of the connection object.

protocolVersion.description: The protocolVersion of the connection object.

additionalProperties.description: A JSON map containing a map of connection-specific values.

bindings.description: A JSON map containing a map of connection-specific values.

messagingServiceType.description: The type of the messaging service.

value.description: Valid Objects are Strings with characters: [a-zA-Z0-9_\-\. ]

CommonId.description: id as automatically issued by APIs , alphanumeric characters only

CommonExternalId.description: Id attribute as supplied by the APi Client
